name: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic Italian pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and olive oil. The dough is hand-stretched and baked in a wood-fired oven for a crispy crust.
chef_special: Chef Luca uses locally sourced mozzarella and freshly picked basil, hand-stretching the dough to ensure perfect texture.

name: Sushi Platter
description: An assortment of sushi rolls including salmon, tuna, and avocado rolls, served with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.
chef_special: Chef Hiroshi's secret is in the balance of fresh fish and homemade wasabi, paired with the finest sushi rice for perfect texture.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: A fragrant rice dish cooked with marinated chicken, basmati rice, saffron, and aromatic spices such as cardamom, cloves, and cinnamon.
chef_special: Chef Arun marinates the chicken overnight in yogurt and spices, infusing maximum flavor while the saffron gives the dish its golden hue.

name: Tacos al Pastor
description: Traditional Mexican tacos made with marinated pork, pineapple, onions, and cilantro, served on corn tortillas with salsa.
chef_special: Chef Diego marinates the pork with a blend of chilies and spices before cooking it on a spit, ensuring a smoky flavor with the perfect caramelized pineapple.

name: French Croissant
description: A buttery, flaky pastry made with layers of dough and butter, rolled and folded multiple times before being baked to perfection.
chef_special: Chef Claire uses traditional French techniques, laminating the dough with butter to create dozens of delicate layers for the perfect flaky croissant.

name: Cheeseburger
description: A juicy beef patty with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles, served on a toasted bun.
chef_special: Chef Jake uses 100% grass-fed beef for the patty, seasoning it just before grilling to lock in the flavors and creating a perfect balance with fresh lettuce and tomato.

name: French Fries
description: Crispy golden fries served with ketchup or mayonnaise.
chef_special: Chef Sophie fries the potatoes twice for extra crispiness and uses a homemade dipping sauce made from organic ingredients.

name: Pasta Carbonara
description: Creamy pasta made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
chef_special: Chef Mario ensures the pancetta is perfectly crisped before combining it with the creamy egg mixture to create a rich, velvety sauce.

name: Ramen
description: A rich broth with wheat noodles, topped with sliced pork, egg, green onions, and nori.
chef_special: Chef Kaito slow-simmers the broth for hours to extract the deepest umami flavor, ensuring the pork is tender and the noodles absorb the rich flavors.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: A rich and moist chocolate cake topped with creamy chocolate frosting.
chef_special: Chef Elise uses premium dark chocolate for the cake and frosting, ensuring the dessert has a deep, rich flavor that melts in your mouth.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: A crispy crust pizza topped with pepperoni, mozzarella cheese, and tomato sauce.
chef_special: Chef Marco uses a special blend of herbs in the tomato sauce for extra flavor.

name: Dragon Roll
description: A sushi roll with eel, avocado, cucumber, and spicy mayo, topped with eel sauce.
chef_special: Chef Yuki uses a homemade eel sauce to enhance the umami flavors.

name: Lamb Biryani
description: Slow-cooked lamb with basmati rice, saffron, and aromatic Indian spices.
chef_special: Chef Ramesh slow-cooks the lamb for a melt-in-your-mouth experience.

name: Carne Asada Tacos
description: Grilled marinated steak tacos served with fresh lime, onions, and cilantro.
chef_special: Chef Javier marinates the steak in citrus and spices for extra flavor.

name: Almond Croissant
description: A flaky butter croissant filled with almond paste and topped with sliced almonds.
chef_special: Chef Pierre adds a touch of orange zest to enhance the almond filling.

name: Bacon Cheeseburger
description: A beef patty with crispy bacon, melted cheese, lettuce, and tomato on a toasted bun.
chef_special: Chef Mike uses smoked bacon for extra crunch and flavor.

name: Sweet Potato Fries
description: Crispy sweet potato fries seasoned with sea salt and paprika.
chef_special: Chef Anna bakes the fries for a healthier alternative to deep-frying.

name: Pesto Pasta
description: Pasta tossed in homemade basil pesto sauce with Parmesan cheese and pine nuts.
chef_special: Chef Sofia uses hand-picked basil from her garden for the pesto.

name: Spicy Miso Ramen
description: Rich miso broth with spicy chili oil, noodles, pork, and soft-boiled egg.
chef_special: Chef Kenji slow-simmers the miso broth for an extra deep flavor.

name: Tiramisu
description: A classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.
chef_special: Chef Alessia uses freshly brewed espresso to soak the ladyfingers for an authentic taste.
